alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 6:10AM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The threat of thunderstorms with this storm system combined with very wet soils will bring an increased risk for downed trees and powerlines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
